ygData.subject: Mez'ing IG's
ygData.msgSnippet: Hail Fellow Bards, Someone said a couple days ago that a L50 enchanter said IG s don t mez. Alot of our guild decided to have a mass IG battle in Perma Monday
ygData.messageBody:
Hail Fellow Bards,

Someone said a couple days ago that a L50 enchanter said IG's don't mez.
Alot of our guild decided to have a mass IG battle in Perma Monday night and
our L45 enc was along. I asked her what success she had, here is her reply:

Actually group mes didnt work well. I DID mes the
spooky spider, but you guys decided to fight it 1st
LOL.

As for the giants, I worked with single mes, spell
called Entrance. AND IT WORKED. Mebbe just for a short
time, but it worked, cuz I received a note 'IG has
been entranced', which is always good to hear.
<snip>

We still got wiped out en-mass, not sure if it was the IG priest or the
Kings room goblins repoping that was the death stroke. Initial pull netted
3 IGs and an IG priest and one of the big spiders, for at least 3 groups of
L30s up to a couple 50's. We definitely need practice coordinating between
groups too. But we had one heck of a great time anyways!


Lady Brilinnia Ban'Sidhe
Knight Marshall, Order of the Rose
Excalibur
